title: Understanding Data Validation
text: Data validation is a feature in Excel that allows you to control what can be entered into a cell. It helps ensure that the data entered is accurate and consistent.

title: Purpose of Data Validation
text: The main purpose of data validation is to restrict the type and range of data that can be entered into a cell. This helps prevent errors and ensures data integrity.

hintAnswer: setting cells to that the values they accept are restricted in terms of type and range of data
title: Identifying the Correct Definition
text: Which of the following best describes data validation?
choices: setting cells to that the values they accept are restricted in terms of type and range of data
